entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming east 30 km/h this morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow at times overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Saturday 8 April 2023
